Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Possess strong antiplasmodial activity against the intra-erythrocyte stage of Plasmodium falciparum in vitro. Interacts with infected and healthy erythrocytes. Does not lyse erythrocytes, is not cytotoxic to nucleated mammalian cells, and does not inhibit neuromuscular function. Has neither antibacterial nor antifungal activity.
Sequence Information.Domain: The presence of a 'disulfide through disulfide knot' structurally defines this protein as a knottin.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains three disulfide bonds and C-terminal amidation.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of Psalmopeotoxin I and II two novel antimalarial peptides from the venom of the tarantula Psalmopoeus cambridgei.
